resources.string: Dogs are domesticated mammals, not natural wild animals. They were originally bred from wolves.
Birds are a group of endothermic vertebrates, characterised by featherswith strong yet lightweight skeleton."
"The domestic cat is a small, typically furry, carnivorous mammal."
Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, ranging across all continents."
Fish are the gill-bearing aquatic craniate animals that lack limbs with digits."
The giant panda, also known as panda bear or simply panda, is a bear native to south central China."
The giraffe is a genus of African even-toed ungulate mammals, the largest ruminants."
Whales are a widely distributed and diverse group of fully aquatic placental marine mammals."
The leopard is one of the five species in the genus Panthera, a member of the Felidae."
The lion is a species in the family Felidae and a member of the genus Panthera."
